com.github.moribund.game

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.moribund.game.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    A single game that is going on. Multiple games go in parallel. The method that judges the creation of a new game is GameContainer.getAvailableGame().
